policies.name: Allow Read Access
policies.using:
((auth.uid() = owner_id) OR (is_public = true) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM document_permissions
  WHERE ((document_permissions.document_id = documents.id) AND (document_permissions.user_email = (auth.jwt() ->> 'email'::text))))))

policies.name: Allow Update
policies.using:
((auth.uid() = owner_id) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM document_permissions
  WHERE ((document_permissions.document_id = documents.id) AND (document_permissions.user_email = (auth.jwt() ->> 'email'::text)) AND (document_permissions.permission_level = 'editor'::text)))))

policies.name: Owners manage permissions
policies.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM documents
  WHERE ((documents.id = document_permissions.document_id) AND (documents.owner_id = auth.uid()))))
